Sentence.sentence: Students in university towns may also have access to another lever for involvement in accelerated math: math circles.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Biologist Jill Farrant of the University of Cape Town in South Africa says that nature has plenty of answers for people who want to grow crops in places with unpredictable rainfall.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: It is a grim reality that you can have one person who only makes around 13,000 dollars a year, while across town another is making millions.

Sentence.sentence: She was going to talk with slides about a town in the 18th century.

Sentence.sentence: You go to a little town in Japan, where nobody speaks English, yet they know you on site and know all your music.

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均含"城市"之意。
means: city ： 一般指大城市或重要城市。
town ： 一般指规模小的城镇，也指城市中的市区，有时也泛指城市。

Sentence.sentence: Berlin has been the easiest while the most difficult was the Czech town of Pilsen.

Sentence.sentence: Boom towns grow from nothing almost overnight.

Sentence.sentence: However, these things are not common in small towns.

Sentence.sentence: The sensible place to build new houses，factories and offices is where people are，in cities and towns where infrastructure is in place.

Sentence.sentence: Rural towns and villages have grown and will always grow.

Sentence.sentence: Half a century of town and country planning has enabled it to retain an enviable rural coherence, while still permitting low-density urban living.

Sentence.sentence: For the first time in history more people live in towns than in the country.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A "town of culture" could be not just about the arts but about honoring a town's peculiarities-helping sustain its high street, supporting local facilities and above all celebrating its people and turn it into action.

Sentence.sentence: A cynic might speculate that the UK is on the verge of disappearing into an endless fever of self-celebration in its desperation to reinvent itself for the post-Brexit world: after town of culture, who knows that will follow-village of culture?

Sentence.sentence: A group of labour MPs, among them Yvette Cooper, are bringing in the new year with a call to institute a UK "town of culture" award.

Sentence.sentence: A town of culture award could, it is argued, become an annual event, attracting funding and creating jobs.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Britain town, it is true are not prevented from applying, but they generally lack the resources to put together a bit to beat their bigger competitions.

Sentence.sentence: But mayors and councilors can only do so much about a problem that is far bigger than any one city or town.

sentences.cn: 他上午打算到商业区去。

means.word_mean: （生活、工作或刚提到的）城镇；城市生活（与乡村生活相对）</seg>

jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)彻底地（或热忱地，铺张地）做某事

lj.lj_ly: I thought I'd &B{go to town on} the redecoration.
lj.lj_ls: 我原想我会不遗余力地进行再装修。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)enjoying the entertainments, especially the nightlife, of a city or town
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)作乐（尤指享受城镇的夜生活）

lj.lj_ly: a lot of guys out for &B{a night on the town}.
lj.lj_ls: 很多夜间外出寻欢作乐的人。

jx.jx_en_mean: In spirited pursuit of the entertainment offered by a town or city.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 积极地寻求镇或城市的娱乐活动

entry.def: A town is a place with many streets and buildings, where people live and work. Towns are larger than villages and smaller than cities. Many places that are called towns in Britain would be called cities in the United States.

example.ex: ...Saturday night in the small town of Braintree, Essex...
example.tran: 埃塞克斯郡布伦特里小镇的周六之夜

example.ex: Parking can be tricky in the town centre.
example.tran: 在市镇中心停车可能会挺费事。

entry.def: You use town in order to refer to the town where you live.

example.ex: He admits he doesn't even know when his brother is in town...
example.tran: 他承认自己甚至不知道弟弟什么时候来了本市。
她离开了自己生活的城镇。

entry.def: You use town in order to refer to the central area of a town where most of the shops and offices are.
entry.tran: 市中心;(城镇的)商业中心；闹市区

example.ex: I caught a bus into town.
example.tran: 我赶上辆公交车去了市中心。

entry.def: If you refer to the town, you are referring to town and city areas in general, as opposed to country areas.

example.ex: More people are going to want to escape from the town into the country…
example.tran: 更多的人将会想要逃离城市到乡村去。

example.ex: It had the advantages of town and country combined.
example.tran: 它兼具都市与乡村的优势。

entry.def: If you say that someone goes to town on something, you mean that they deal with it with a lot of enthusiasm or intensity.
entry.tran: 满腔热情地干;拼命地干

example.ex: We really went to town on it, turning it into a full, three-day show...
example.tran: 我们下了真功夫，把它办成了一场内容丰富、为时三天的展览。

example.ex: The papers got hold of it and went to town on it…
example.tran: 报纸抓住这件事大做文章。

entry.def: If you describe someone as a man about town or a woman about town, you mean that they are sophisticated, like to go out and spend money, and have a busy social life.
entry.tran: 社交忙人;花花公子/时髦女郎

example.ex: He was known as a tall, handsome man about town…
example.tran: 他以高大英俊的花花公子形象为人所知。

example.ex: He is an old flame of Sarah's, from her days as a single girl about town.
example.tran: 他是萨拉的旧情人，是她作为单身时髦女郎时的旧爱。

entry.def: If you go out on the town or go for a night on the town, you enjoy yourself by going to a town centre in the evening and spending a long time there visiting several places of entertainment.

example.ex: My idea of luxury used to be going out on the town and coming back in the early hours of the morning...
example.tran: 我过去对奢侈的概念是夜晚在闹市通宵玩乐到清晨才回来。

example.ex: Last Saturday, I was out on the town with my mate…
example.tran: 上个星期六我和老友晚上去闹市玩乐了。

means.word_mean: 1. an urban area with a fixed boundary that is smaller than a city;

sentences.sentence: "they drive through town on their way to work"

means.word_mean: 2. an administrative division of a county;

sentences.sentence: "the town is responsible for snow removal"

means.word_mean: 3. the people living in a municipality smaller than a city;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English tūn 'enclosed piece of land, homestead, village', of Germanic origin; related to Dutch tuin 'garden' and German Zaun 'fence'

sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 太阳将这些镀金的圆屋顶变成了闪耀的光点.
sentences.en: The sun transform the gild cupola into dazzling point of light.

sentences.cn: 山上那座古老城镇的周围有城墙.
sentences.en: The old town on the hill was walled round.

sentences.cn: 马戏团的帐篷搭在这个城镇附近.
sentences.en: The circus tented near the town.

sentences.cn: 如何利用临街样点地价推算区片平均地价及基准地价始终是城镇基准地价评估的一个难点.
sentences.en: In small towns, standard land price assessment is difficult low land use benefit and land market.

sentences.cn: 尽管赦免了叛乱, 但叛乱依然蔓延到了达卡的其他城镇.
sentences.en: Despite an amnesty offer, the mutiny spread to other towns and tanks were mobilised in Dhaka.

sentences.cn: 在传递紧急信息时,国王采取每一城镇更换驿马的接力式传送方法以赢得时间.
sentences.en: In transmitting urgent messages the king gained time by relaying at each town.

sentences.cn: 越来越多的威尼斯人离开礁湖,定居在其他城镇.
sentences.en: More and more Venetians are moving away from the lagoon to settle down in other towns.

sentences.cn: Updike曾描述他的主题是 “ 美国小城镇, 中产阶级的新教徒. ”
sentences.en: Updike once described his subject matter as " the American small town, Protestant middle class "

sentences.cn: 建筑商们正在开发该城镇的那部分地区.
sentences.en: The builders are developing that part of town.

sentences.cn: 尽量交朋友,并带他们参观你们的城镇.
sentences.en: Try to make friends and show them around your town.

sentences.cn: 城镇的许多地方死气沉沉,似乎2005年9月的那场洪水刚刚过去.
sentences.en: Many sections of town look as lifeless as they did after the floods in September 2005.

sentences.cn: 1998年被国家确定为农村小城镇建设试点镇.
sentences.en: Country in 1998 was identified as the pilot construction of small towns in rural towns.

sentences.cn: 沿林阴大道种花将有助于美化城镇.
sentences.en: Planting flowers along the boulevards will help to beautify the town.

sentences.cn: 许多企业关闭,房屋价格下降,小城镇和乡村受到的冲击更加严重.
sentences.en: Home values have declined. Small towns and rural communities have been hit especially hard.

sentences.cn: 一些城镇里街道特别脏.
sentences.en: It'some cities and towns the streets are filthy.

sentences.cn: 城镇里大街小巷洪水奔流.
sentences.en: All the streets in the town were streaming with flood water.

sentences.cn: 人们聚集起来,组成国民自卫队来保卫他们的城镇.
sentences.en: People gathered to form a militia to protect their town.

sentences.cn: 城镇附近的国家公园占地6641平方公里.
sentences.en: The National Park around the town covers an area of 6 , 641 square kilometers.

sentences.cn: 他很了解这个城镇.
sentences.en: He knows the town well.

sentences.cn: 那次爆炸事件把这城镇炸得七零八碎.
sentences.en: The explosion tore the town to pieces.

sentences.cn: 所有的字典都将“郊区”定义为在城市和城镇以外的地区.
sentences.en: Any dictionary will define the suburbs as those areas that lie outside cities and towns.

sentences.cn: 这个政治家在当地城镇管理层面前发了言.
sentences.en: The politician addressed the local town board.

sentences.cn: 悉达多再没回到城镇.
sentences.en: Siddhartha never went back to the town.

sentences.cn: 每逢假日,这个小城镇就活跃起来了.
sentences.en: On holidays the little town wakes up.

sentences.cn: 高卢北部几乎每个城镇都被攻陷.
sentences.en: Nearly every town in northern Gaul was sacked.

sentences.cn: 在市镇中心停车可能会挺费事。
sentences.en: Parking can be tricky in the town centre.

sentences.cn: 这几个市镇相距有很多英里; 两腿叉开站着; 出生时间相距两年.
sentences.en: These towns are many miles apart; stood with his legs apart; born two years apart.

sentences.cn: 教堂是大部分社交和团体生活的中心,在小市镇尤其如此.
sentences.en: Especially in small towns, churches are centers for much social and community life.

sentences.cn: 几家化学工厂排出的有害废水正流入通过我们市镇的河里.
sentences.en: Dangerous effluent from some chemical plants is being poured into the river through the town.

sentences.cn: 大气降水总体良好, 仅个别城市 ( 镇 ) 出现过酸雨.
sentences.en: In general, atmospheric precipitation was good, acid rain occurred only in a few cities ( towns ).

sentences.cn: 当局正分期发展这个新市镇.
sentences.en: The new town is being developed in phases.

sentences.cn: 你妹妹早就从这个市镇搬走了,时隔多年了我不知道你去哪儿能找到她.
sentences.en: I don't know where you'll find your sister after all these years ; she moved away from the town a long time ago.

sentences.cn: 在这个先后叫做特米尔纳斯、马撒斯维尔和亚特兰大的市镇落户的人, 都是很有闯劲的.
sentences.en: The people who settled the town called successively Terminus , Marthasville and Atlanta, were a pushy people.

sentences.cn: 我要去帮助穷人,为城市和市镇筹集资金.
sentences.en: I'd help the poor and raise money for the cities and towns.

sentences.cn: 这两个市镇有铁路相连.
sentences.en: The two towns are connected by a railway.

sentences.cn: 像伊州中西部的市镇一样,盖尔斯堡受到了海外制造业的大力冲击.
sentences.en: Like towns across and western Illinois, Galesburg had been pounded by the shift of manufacturing overseas.

sentences.cn: 主要见证人向警方提交宣过誓的证词后,才可离开市镇.
sentences.en: The chief witness was allowed to leave the town only after lodging a sworn statement with the police.

sentences.cn: 敌人对市镇的进攻似乎已被阻止.
sentences.en: The enemy drive towards the town seemed checked.

sentences.cn: 他觉得这个市镇 怎么样 .

sentences.cn: 这个市镇公共交通设施很完善.

sentences.cn: 这并不是什么普通的市镇, 可是, 不论怎么说,这也是个很不错的根据地.

sentences.cn: 这市镇最大的购物中心在哪里?

sentences.cn: 你是不是也是开车逛遍了整个市镇却得不到一丝的满足感 呢 ?
sentences.en: Do you seem to drive around town a great deal but have little satisfaction?

sentences.en: They immediately searched the town and the next day took him into custody.

sentences.cn: 古堡耸立在市镇中一个高处.

sentences.cn: 能保护这个市镇不受攻击 吗 ?

sentences.cn: 这条路把所有的新市镇连接在一起.
